sentences.sContent: We can stay in a motel overnight, then continue on to Copenhagen tomorrow.
sentences.sContent_eng: We can stay in a motel overnight, then continue on to Copenhagen tomorrow.
sentences.sCn: 我们可以在一家汽车旅馆过夜，然后明天再继续出发到哥本哈根。

sentences.sContent: A wide range of hotel, motel and apartment accommodation is available in most cities, major resorts and many rural areas.
sentences.sContent_eng: A wide range of hotel, motel and apartment accommodation is available in most cities, major resorts and many rural areas.
sentences.sCn: 在大部分城市、主要旅游点和许多农村地区，都能找到各种类型的旅馆、汽车旅馆和公寓住所。

trans.tranOther: a hotel for people who are travelling by car, where you can park your car outside your room
